import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default function FavouritesList() { const useFavourites = useSelector((state) => state.account.value.favourites); const products = useSelector((state) => state.products.value); console.log(useFavourites); console.log(products); const listOfFavourites = userFavourites.map((idFav) => { const result = products.find(item => item.id === idFav ) return el; }); console.log("ListOfFavourites", listOfFavourites); return (
